meanings.definition: The act of revising or reviewing something.
meanings.sent1: After careful revisal of his essay, he made some changes to improve it.
meanings.sent2: The revisal of the report revealed several errors that needed correction.
meanings.sent3: During the revisal of the play, they discovered a funny typo that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her revisal of the recipe turned a bland dish into a flavorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The revisal of the painting brought out hidden details that amazed the viewers.

meanings.definition: A revised version or edition of a document or work.
meanings.sent1: The new revisal of the textbook included updated information for the students.
meanings.sent2: She eagerly awaited the revisal of her favorite book with added chapters.
meanings.sent3: The revisal of the song lyrics gave it a fresh and modern twist.
meanings.sent4: The revisal of the software fixed all the bugs and improved its performance.
meanings.sent5: The revisal of the contract clarified the terms for both parties involved.
